class.name: VAnimatedBar
class.brief_description: Class for creating vertical tool bar.
class.description: Positions its [Control] children in vertical orientation with navigation buttons on top and bottom sides. See also [AnimatedBar] for more details.

method.name: get_left_navigation_button_size
method.description: Overwrites [AnimatedBar].get_left_navigation_button_size() virtual method. Returns size of top navigation button. [b]Note:[/b] Returned value contains spacing.

method.name: get_navigation_buttons_size
method.description: Overwrites [AnimatedBar].get_navigation_buttons_size() virtual method. Returns size of top plus bottom navigation button. [b]Note:[/b] Returned value contains double size of spacing.

method.name: get_right_navigation_button_size
method.description: Overwrites [AnimatedBar].get_right_navigation_button_size() virtual method. Returns size of bottom navigation button. [b]Note:[/b] Returned value contains spacing.
